items.headline: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Should I spend down my assets to qualify for Medicaid?
items.summary_en: “I was born in a time when the elderly and disabled were hidden away in back bedrooms and institutions.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m 70 and have Alzheimer’s. My son’s girlfriend put $750 worth of lottery tickets on a credit card I gave him. What can I do?
items.summary_en: “I contacted the credit-card company, but was advised they could not reimburse me for the theft.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I thought she was honest’: My ex-wife hid stocks during our divorce. Can I sue her?
items.summary_en: “I have contacted her about it, but she refuses to answer my calls.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My wife and I are in our 40s. We have a $600K mortgage and $500K annual income. Can we afford a vacation home?
items.summary_en: “We plan to work another 20 years and we estimate $3-$4 million in 401(k) savings.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I feel overwhelmed’: I’m a widow in my early 40s with 3 children. I have $330K in IRAs. Will we be OK?
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I inherited $600K in Apple stock. It now makes up 50% of my portfolio. Is that too risky?
items.summary_en: “I worry that a downturn in the tech sector, or something Apple-specific, could wipe out half my portfolio.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The small-business hiring engine is sputtering. Why that’s a red flag for the economy.
items.summary_en: Without small businesses and their hiring, already precarious economic growth could be prone to a pullback.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
items.summary_en: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”

items.headline: Banking on ‘Sit at the Bar September’ to find love? How to get the best romantic return on your investment.
items.summary_en: MarketWatch talked to experienced bartenders about ways to increase your chances of meeting someone in person.

items.headline: My former mother-in-law left a $1 million estate. Can I sue my ex-husband for a share of it?
items.summary_en: “My mother-in-law did not leave me anything in her will, but she should have.”
